minestra.text

Class ResourceSheaf

  • java.lang.Object
    • minestra.text.ResourceSheaf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropsRef

    public final class ResourceSheaf
extends Object
implements PropsRef
    ResourceSheaf provides to build a sheaf of i18nized message resources. The word "sheaf" means "bundle" (ResourceBundle).

    • Method Summary

        public ResourceSheaf withMessages()
        Returns an instance replaced with "messages" as a name.

        This method behaves in the same way as the invocation withName("messages").
